get.description: Gets the private link resources that need to be created for a storage sync service.
Gets the specified private endpoint connection associated with the storage sync service.

200.description: OK -- Get the private endpoint connection properties successfully.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Update the state of specified private endpoint connection associated with the storage sync service.

200.description: OK -- Update the private endpoint connection properties successfully.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes the specified private endpoint connection associated with the storage sync service.

200.description: OK -- Delete the private endpoint connection successfully.

204.description: No Content -- The private endpoint connection does not exist.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

error.description: Error details of the given entry.

directoryPath.description: Relative path to a directory Azure File share for which change detection is to be performed.

changeDetectionMode.description: Change Detection Mode. Applies to a directory specified in directoryPath parameter.

paths.description: Array of relative paths on the Azure File share to be included in the change detection. Can be files and directories.

TriggerChangeDetectionParameters.description: The parameters used when calling trigger change detection action on cloud endpoint.

RecallActionParameters.description: The parameters used when calling recall action on server endpoint.

location.description: Required. Gets or sets the location of the resource. This will be one of the supported and registered Azure Geo Regions (e.g. West US, East US, Southeast Asia, etc.). The geo region of a resource cannot be changed once it is created, but if an identical geo region is specified on update, the request will succeed.

tags.description: Gets or sets a list of key value pairs that describe the resource. These tags can be used for viewing and grouping this resource (across resource groups). A maximum of 15 tags can be provided for a resource. Each tag must have a key with a length no greater than 128 characters and a value with a length no greater than 256 characters.

properties.description: The parameters used to create the storage sync service.

initialDownloadPolicy.description: Policy for how namespace and files are recalled during FastDr.

localCacheMode.description: Policy for enabling follow-the-sun business models: link local cache to cloud behavior to pre-populate before local access.

initialUploadPolicy.description: Policy for how the initial upload sync session is performed.

properties.description: The parameters used to create the registered server.

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of operations.

display.description: The operation supported by storage sync.

OperationDisplayInfo.description: The operation supported by storage sync.

operation.description: The action that users can perform, based on their permission level.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed.

serviceSpecification.description: Service specification for the operations resource.

supportedAggregationTypes.description: Supported aggregation types for the metric.

fillGapWithZero.description: Fill gaps in the metric with zero.

toBeExportedForShoebox.description: Indicates metric should be exported for Shoebox.

name.description: The name to check for availability

type.description: The resource type. Must be set to Microsoft.StorageSync/storageSyncServices

CheckNameAvailabilityParameters.description: Parameters for a check name availability request.

nameAvailable.description: Gets a boolean value that indicates whether the name is available for you to use. If true, the name is available. If false, the name has already been taken or invalid and cannot be used.

reason.description: Gets the reason that a Storage Sync Service name could not be used. The Reason element is only returned if NameAvailable is false.

message.description: Gets an error message explaining the Reason value in more detail.

azureFileShareUri.description: Post Restore Azure file share uri.

sourceAzureFileShareUri.description: Post Restore Azure source azure file share uri.

failedFileList.description: Post Restore Azure failed file list.

restoreFileSpec.description: Post Restore restore file spec array.

items.description: Post Restore restore file spec items array.

items.description: Pre Restore restore file spec items array.

pauseWaitForSyncDrainTimePeriodInSeconds.description: Pre Restore pause wait for sync drain time period in seconds.

cloudTieringStatus.description: Cloud tiering status. Only populated if cloud tiering is enabled.

recallStatus.description: Recall status. Only populated if cloud tiering is enabled.

lastSyncPerItemErrorCount.description: Last sync per item error count.

persistentFilesNotSyncingCount.description: Count of persistent files not syncing.

transientFilesNotSyncingCount.description: Count of transient files not syncing.

filesNotSyncingErrors.description: Array of per-item errors coming from the last sync session.

transientCount.description: Count of transient files not syncing with the specified error code

healthLastUpdatedTimestamp.description: The last updated timestamp of health state

spaceSavings.description: Information regarding how much local space cloud tiering is saving.

cachePerformance.description: Information regarding how well the local cache on the server is performing.

filesNotTiering.description: Information regarding files that failed to be tiered

volumeFreeSpacePolicyStatus.description: Status of the volume free space policy

CloudTieringSpaceSavings.description: Server endpoint cloud tiering status object.

totalSizeCloudBytes.description: Total size of content in the azure file share

cachedSizeBytes.description: Cached content size on the server

spaceSavingsPercent.description: Percentage of cached size over total size

spaceSavingsBytes.description: Count of bytes saved on the server

CloudTieringCachePerformance.description: Server endpoint cloud tiering status object.

cacheHitBytes.description: Count of bytes that were served from the local server

cacheMissBytes.description: Count of bytes that were served from the cloud

cacheHitBytesPercent.description: Percentage of total bytes (hit + miss) that were served from the local server

CloudTieringFilesNotTiering.description: Server endpoint cloud tiering status object.

fileCount.description: Count of files with this error

CloudTieringVolumeFreeSpacePolicyStatus.description: Status of the volume free space policy

effectiveVolumeFreeSpacePolicy.description: In the case where multiple server endpoints are present in a volume, an effective free space policy is applied.

tieredFilesMostRecentAccessTimestamp.description: Most recent access time of tiered files

count.description: Count of occurences of the error

RegisteredServerAgentVersionStatus.description: Type of the registered server agent version status

CloudEndpointChangeEnumerationStatus.description: Cloud endpoint change enumeration status object

lastEnumerationStatus.description: Status of last completed change enumeration

CloudEndpointLastChangeEnumerationStatus.description: Cloud endpoint change enumeration status object

namespaceFilesCount.description: Count of files in the namespace

namespaceDirectoriesCount.description: Count of directories in the namespace

nextRunTimestamp.description: Timestamp of when change enumeration is expected to run again

CloudEndpointChangeEnumerationActivity.description: Cloud endpoint change enumeration activity object

statusCode.description: When non-zero, indicates an issue that is delaying change enumeration

progressPercent.description: Progress percentage for change enumeration run, excluding processing of deletes

minutesRemaining.description: Estimate of time remaining for the enumeration run

deletesProgressPercent.description: Progress percentage for processing deletes. This is done separately from the rest of the enumeration run

CloudEndpointChangeEnumerationTotalCount.description: State of the total counts of change enumeration activity
